items.sentence: Don\'t forget to tell Tom that he has to do that.
Don\'t you think you speak French better than me?
I was as surprised by Tom\'s refusal as you were.
Tom wouldn\'t drink the coffee Mary made for him.
Tom wouldn\'t rest until he did his daily chores.
Tom wrapped the blanket around Mary\'s shoulders.
Tom didn\'t get a chance to visit the art museum.
Tom didn\'t get in until after 2:30 this morning.
Tom didn\'t have anything to do with the scandal.
Tom didn\'t have anything to say on that subject.
